EmailTemplate.description: Introducing SelfServ™ 21 for India and Southeast Asia https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/cash-dispense-atms/selfserv21
EmailTemplate.name: 10-28-21 BNK SelfServ 21 Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR’s New Cash Dispenser Lands in Southeast Asia
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers want choice when it comes to payments—and while digital accelerates, cash remains an important part of the mix. So you’ll need to meet consumers’ demands, while also offering an exceptional, modern experience. NCR’s new SelfServ 21 - a compact lobby cash dispenser for India and SEA - offers just that.  Built for the banking customer of today and tomorrow, the NCR SelfServ21 is centered around customer experience, security and availability. Watch our video to find out how it could help you improve your self-service network. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
